name: Panorama (FrancoDanielGarcia)
description:
BUG WARNING: There's a small bug that if you start the game and don't, manually, change the language in the Pause Menu (Press P to open it) it can be change to another language. We're sorry for this incovenient.

Game created for this GameJam: https://itch.io/jam/narrative-game-jam-5

Created on Unity.

Members roles:

* Programming: Franco Daniel Garcia & Joaquin Moore

* Art: Iara Dalila Alexia Libert & Santiago Roque D' Angelo

* Game Design: Iara Dalila Alexia Libert

* Music:  Santiago Roque D' Angelo

* Localization: Franco Daniel Garcia

* Narrative: Santiago Roque D' Angelo

* SFX: Chiptone (https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone)
